# itemTime

**Instance Property**

A time in the item timeline to use to begin playback.

## Declaration

```swift
var itemTime: CMTime { get }
```

## Accessing command details

- **rate**: A rate to use when starting playback.
- **hostClockTime**: A host clock time to use to begin playback.
